### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)

### Stone Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)

### Coal Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)

### Coal Storage at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)

### Coal Storage at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)

### Inserter System at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) connected to a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5) and a Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item being extracted before attempting to extract it.
- Check the chest's inventory to avoid attempting to extract items that are not present.

### Errors when using a burner mining drill
- Ensure the drill is fueled before attempting to mine.
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining when it is full.

### Errors when using an inserter
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to insert items.
- Check the inserter's pickup and drop positions to avoid attempting to insert items into a full chest.
